post.text: If you want to see the best of America, you need look no further than the example set by Army Captain Humayun Khan.

comment.author: Claire
comment.text: That don't mean anything she is our best hope to keep health care if it wasn't for the health care my cousion would't be getting the help he needs and he is fighting cancer

replies.author: Allee
replies.text: She stole credit for CHIP- Senator Kennedy wrote CHIP and was gracious enough to thank her for her support and she stole credit.

replies.author: Evan
replies.text: I guess they are on welfare? Because if they actually pay for it.. they wont be able to afford it when it double s in January.

replies.author: Adriana
replies.text: BEST HOPE TO JAIL: BLAME RUSSIANS FOR HER CRIMES AGAINST AMERICA & BERNIE!!! LOCK HER UP!!

replies.author: Trust
replies.text: Obamacare is a failure, our cost have skyrocketed, there are 1000s of pregnant women who are not covered because they missed the enrollment period, and pregnancy is considered a preexisting condition.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Trust Without Obamacare people with pre-existing would denied health insurance. If you think it's so bad and needs to be repealed tell it to them who will lose their healthcare
